attributes.action: force cabinet members to repay excessive expenses claims or leave the party.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These cabinet members have failed to give moral leadership and the voters are appalled and feel let down by their excessive claims. They have shown very little remorse and are claiming that the claims are within the rules. It is clear that their claims are unethical and wrong and should be repaid in full and apologise in public

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
